resources.string:
If the field is empty, /system/bin/sh -l will be executed;
/system/bin/sh -l -c <command> otherwise.
Note: except Android 4.0.X where sh has no -l option.

Grants termsh an ability to silently read/write favorites.

Note: Any process running in the terminal could reach any application configuration file anyway if not in a sandbox environment like PRoot.
Shell plugins execution by termsh. Plugins set as «Always accessible» in the Plugins settings can be run independently of this permission state.

Grants termsh an ability to write to the Android clipboard.

It can be performed only when the user is interacting with the current session UI and silently ignored otherwise.
Show in «share with» / «open in» chooser dialog
Send a signal to the foreground process group
The PTY is still open by some peer after the foreground process group has exitedâ€¦ Timeout reached
